CHAT.comment: THE BLACK & DECKER DISABILITY PLAN, Petitioner v. KENNETH L. NORD
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LEE T. PATERSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LISA S. BLATT ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAWRENCE D. ROHLFING ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF LEE T. PATERSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:01 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
